#** * Welcome text for welcome block on the messages page * @translate This page requires full translation * @type content * @refactored ludovic *# When you create a message, you give it a title, write or paste in text content, style or format it using the editing toolbar, and click "Submit" to send your message.
Currently, group messaging on Curriki allows you to send messages to your whole group. Starting in February, you will also be able to send messages only to specific members within your group.
